mapper.sql: id, no, title, app_type, ad_type, service_type_ids, img_url, goto_type, action, goto_url, add_time, update_time, enable
mapper.select:
select
from op_ad where 1=1
and title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' )
and app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ad_type like CONCAT('%','${adType}','%' )
and service_type_ids = #{serviceTypeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by id desc

select
from op_ad where ad_type like CONCAT('%',#{adType},'%' )
mapper.insert: insert into op_ad (id, no, title, app_type, ad_type, service_type_ids, img_url, goto_type, action, goto_url, add_time, update_time, enable) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{No,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTypeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gotoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gotoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{enable,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

mapper.update:
update op_ad
no = #{No,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ad_type = #{adType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

enable = #{enable,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
